mapper.select: select p.perm_name from emp e inner join user_role ur on e.emp_id=ur.user_id inner join role r on ur.role_id=r.role_id inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id=rp.role_id inner join permission p on p.perm_id=rp.perm_id where e.emp_login_name=#{empLoginName}
